articles.author: Josh Halliday
articles.title: Gary Lineker row hits BBC's Match of the Day 2 and WSL coverage - The Guardian
articles.description: Disruption to sports programming continues into second day as pressure grows on BBC chairman Richard Sharp
articles.content:
The BBC has been forced to scale back a second day of sports programming amid a deepening row over the suspension of Gary Lineker.
The corporation will air a shortened version of Match of the Day 2 … [+5371 chars]

articles.title: College baseball umpire suspended after 'horrific' strike calls end game - The Guardian
articles.description: A college baseball umpire was suspended indefinitely by the Southland Conference on Saturday in connection with a pair of late called strikes
articles.content: A college baseball umpire was suspended indefinitely by the Southland Conference on Saturday in connection with a pair of late called strikes to end a game between Mississippi Valley State and New Or… [+1394 chars]
